entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 18 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers or a few thunderstorms beginning this morning. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 18 except 13 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
